title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 421.1 - Scope and application of this Part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 421.1 - Scope and application of this Part

State Regulations

Section
9-w
of the Banking

Law authorizes the superintendent to adopt rules and regulations for the
implementation of a standard financial aid award letter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
421.1

Adopted

New

York State Register November 23, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 47, eff. 11/23/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
